definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be complete, finished (Ar. tam=a id., Ph. [[תם]], Syr. tam der. spec. and deriv.; cf. NH = BH (rare), Aram. [[תְּמִימָא]], tamiymo0 perfect);—

be finished, completed; the writing of words De 31:24, De 31:30 (v. Dr.; J), Job 31:40; building of temple 1Ki 6:22, cf. 1Ki 7:22; fulfilled, ´[[י]]:’s command (by obedience) Jos 4:10 (E); as auxil. + vb. fin. = completely, wholly, entirely, [[תַּמּוּ נִבְתָָוּ]] Jos 3:16 (E) were wholly cut off; [[סָפוּ]] [[תַמּוּ]] Ps 73:19 entirely consumed; sq. [[ל]] inf.: [[תַּמּוּ]] [[לעבור]] were finished in regard to, etc., i.e. were entirely passed over Jos 3:17, Jos 4:1, Jos 4:11 (JE) 2Sa 15:24; [[לחמּול]] Jos 5:8 (E) entirely circumcised, Nu 17:28.
be finished, come to an end, cease: the year, Ge 47:18 (J), Le 25:29 (P), Je 1:3; the years of ´[[י]]: have no end Ps 102:28; days of weeping De 34:8 (P), cf. La 4:22; also Is 18:5, La 3:22.
be complete, of number, 1Sa 16:11.
be consumed, exhausted, spent: silver Ge 47:15, Ge 47:18 (J); strength Le 26:20 (H); lead Je 6:29 (Qr); bread Je 37:21; fruit Ez Eze 47:12; rust Eze 24:11.
be complete, sound, unimpaired, ethically, Ps 19:14 (‖[[נִקָּה ]]; late).
twice, very strangely, si vera 1., trans.: Ps 64:7 [[תמנו]] we have completed (rd. prob. [[הֲתִמּׂנוּ]]); Je 27:8 [[עַד־תֻּמּׂי אׂתָם בְּיׇדוֹ]] (read with Gr [[תִּתִּי]]).
finish, complete, perfect, a matter 2Sa 20:18 (but

definitions.title: Qal,
definitions.body: come to an end, c. [[ה]] interrog., We Dr al.); flesh in cooking Ez Eze 24:10.
finish, cease doing a thing, sq. pt. (Ges:§ 120 b), [[שׁוֹדֵד]] Is 33:1.
complete, sum up, c. acc. money 2Ki 22:4 (other conj. Klo Gr Gi); transgressions Da 8:23; sin Da 9:24 (Qr; Kt [[חתם]]).
destroy uncleanness, c. [[מן]] from, Ez Eze 22:15.
causative (of

definitions.title: Qal 6
definitions.body: ): acc. [[דרכיך]] Job 22:3 make sound thy ways.

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[תִּתַּמָּם]] 2Sa 22:26, c. [[עִם]] deal in integrity with = Ps 18:26 (late, v.
